thread.title: Mahie Gill is keeping away from her film promotions. But why?
thread.title_full: Mahie Gill is keeping away from her film promotions. But why? - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Mahie Gill is keeping away from her film promotions. But why?
text:
Mahie Gill 
Mahie Gill steered clear of the promotions of her recent release, Wedding Anniversary, which has Nana Patekar as co-star.
The makers claim as she is superstitious. The actress feels when she promotes her films, they donâ€™t do well. But, those in the know say there is more to it. Mahie did not step out due to personal reasons which she wants to keep under wraps. Whatever the reasons, we hope the films do well.
